The traffic lights in the image are not distinctly visible, but the brake lights of the vehicles ahead may suggest that there is a red light. In the absence of a clear view of the traffic lights, the ego car must proceed with caution, ready to respond to the traffic signals once they become visible.

There are no vulnerable road users, traffic cones, or barriers present in the image, thus these categories do not require consideration in the current driving context.
